articles.description: The peculiar Loewe dress on the cover isn’t the culprit. It’s the photographs inside the magazine that have drawn new accusations of “blackfishing”.
articles.content: Whats this about Kim Kardashian taking centre stage in the rage spotlight after appearing on the March cover of US Vogue? Is it about that weird breastplate on the dress? The peculiar Loewe dress on … [+3859 chars]

articles.author: Chuck Arnold, Page Six
articles.title: Inside Whitney’s tragic final weekend - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Two days before her death on February 11, 2012, Whitney Houston showed up to rehearsals for mentor Clive Davis’ annual pre-Grammy gala, a glitzy night of music and mingling that she was planning to attend.
articles.content: Whitney Houston checked herself into the Beverley Hilton Hotel 10 years ago this week. She left in a coroners vehicle.Two days before her death on February 11, 2012, Whitney Houston showed up to rehe… [+8624 chars]
